actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to amend section 111 of title 23, United States Code, to permit the sale of State lottery tickets on Interstate System rights-of-way.

summary.text: Permits the sale of State lottery tickets on Interstate System rights-of-way at public-controlled recreation or rest areas.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 111 of title 23, United States Code, to permit the sale of State lottery tickets on Interstate System rights-of-way.
